snippet: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar didn't mention either Donald Trump or Hillary Clinton by name, but the presidential election was on his mind when he came to Harvard on Saturday to talk to the players on the Crimson basketball team....
lead_paragraph: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar didn't mention either Donald Trump or Hillary Clinton by name, but the presidential election was on his mind when he came to Harvard on Saturday to talk to the players on the Crimson basketball team.

headline.main: Abdul-Jabbar Visits Harvard, Tells Players to Stay in School
headline.print_headline: Abdul-Jabbar Visits Harvard, Tells Players to Stay in School
